The RadioGenix System is a technetium Tc 99m generator that produces Sodium Pertechnetate Tc 99m Injection, USP from a non-uranium potassium molybdate Mo-99 source solution, which is shielded within a source container that completely encases a vial containing 22-30 mL of solution; The company has made a business decision to discontinue production and distribution.
